intro: Tetrapogon tenellus, commonly known as the slender sandwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Montiaceae. It is a low-growing perennial herb that typically thrives in arid and semi-arid environments. The plant has small, succulent leaves that help it conserve water in dry conditions.
